admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF036643-CHINA - FOURTH NATIONAL AND
            SECOND FUJIAN PROVINCIAL HGIHWAYS,TF038822-CHINA - PREPARATION O FJAIANGXI
            II, II AND INNER MONGOLIA,TF040412-CHINA:  SECOND JIANGXI HIGHWAY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the China Second Jiangxi
            Highway Project were as follows: outcomes were satisfactory,
            the risk to development outcome was low or negligible, the
            Bank performance was moderately satisfactory, and the
            Borrower performance was satisfactory. Some lessons learned
            included: 1) closer review of designs and technical
            specifications are required; 2) it is important to ensure
            that the Bank teams regularly visit the site; 3) improve the
            planning and design of interchanges and interconnecting
            roads; 4) the activities of foreign supervision consultants
            needs to be carefully designed so as to ensure they add
            value to the project; and 5) need to continue pressing
            solutions to the overloading problem.
